alert.note: Alert for Christian; Todd; Trigg (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 9:47AM EDT until June 17 at 10:45AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Christian County in south central Kentucky... Southeastern Trigg County in western Kentucky... Todd County in south central Kentucky... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 847 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Nortonville to 7 miles southeast of Cobb to near Land Between The Lakes Area, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hopkinsville, Pembroke, Oak Grove, Fort Campbell and Guthrie. This includes the following highways... Interstate 24 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 76 and 92. Pennyrile Parkway between Mile Markers 1 and 6. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
